## ScriptLoader.load() method

Attach all lua scripts in a given directory to a client instance

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
load(client: RedisClient, pathname: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  client | [RedisClient](./bullmq.redisclient.md) | redis client to attach script to |
|  pathname | string | the path to the directory containing the scripts |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
